## MAGIC HEARSE REDUX
## No More DeathWaves!
- Is your city overrun with hearses and annoying hearse notifications? - This mod removes death in your cities. - No death = no crematoriums, cemeteries, or hearses clogging up the roads.
Citizens will magically disappear upon death.
## Features - Works automatically - just install the mod and enable the checkbox in Options. - Silent operation: enable/disable without restarting your game. - Does not use Harmony or Reflection (increases reliability on game patch days). - Works with new and existing saves. - Safe to remove any time - Make sure to **remove** all other Hearse/Deathcare mods to avoid conflicts
## Outcomes
Hearse drivers out of job seek employment in the shipping industry.
## Support and Feedback - If the mod works for you, give it a Like! - Discord: https://discord.gg/HTav7ARPs2
